Name: Dream Cocktail
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An after-dinner cocktail with brandy, orange liqueur, and a refreshing burst of absinthe.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Dream Cocktail contains 184 calories
